channel.title: Some help
channel.description: ok well on my server ( [b]562[/b] ) its a spawning server, but theres still some rares because u cant spawn them. i have 1 shop that sells these rares and wen i try to sell an item for money bc u cant spawn money, it tells me " you cannot sell this item in this shop " so basicly u cant get money. can someone tell me how i can start selling my items in that shop.. thanks : D

item.title: Some help
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

yea i was thinking about that but i dont no the command

i need to add some shops too because spawning is boring… but i fail at adding shops lol

Read full topic

item.title: Some help
item.dc:creator: @Using_me Using me
item.description:
@Using_me wrote:

italy544:

ok well on my server ( 562 ) its a spawning server, but theres still some rares because u cant spawn them. i have 1 shop that sells these rares and wen i try to sell an item for money bc u cant spawn money, it tells me " you cannot sell this item in this shop " so basicly u cant get money. can someone tell me how i can start selling my items in that shop… thanks : D

I’m not pro, but I’ve never seen it being done before and I think your best bet is to have a ::sellall command. Of course, if there is someone who knows, you should listen to them and not me.

Read full topic
